summary: Provides a searchable, filterable index of a DVC repository's artifacts—including stages, outputs, metrics, parameters, and plots—and offers read‑only views that expose hierarchical trees, dependency graphs, and various derived collections for querying and visualisation.
business_intent: Enable users and automated tools to efficiently explore, query, and visualise the contents and relationships of data versioned projects, facilitating monitoring of model performance, data lineage tracking, and integration with CI/CD pipelines.
